lead_paragraph: Although they are all accomplished women in some ways, a Beijing widow and her three daughters have not been successful in love. But the daughters now begin new romances, one in Beijing, one in Sydney, and one in a space station.
snippet: Although they are all accomplished women in some ways, a Beijing widow and her three daughters have not been successful in love. But the daughters now begin new romances, one in Beijing, one in Sydney, and one in a space station.
